code: import{sortDataByAmout,sortDataByDate,sortDataByStatus}from"./sort";var clickId=null;var allIDs=["StateButton","DateButton","AmountButton"];export function StateSortClick(){clickId="StateButton";sortDataByStatus();CILSortBarButton();}export function DateSortClick(){clickId="DateButton";sortDataByDate();CILSortBarButton();}export function AmoutSortClick(){clickId="AmountButton";sortDataByAmout();CILSortBarButton();}export function CILSortBarButton(){allIDs.forEach(function(item){document.getElementById(item).style.color="#8f8f8f";});document.getElementById(clickId).style.color="#ffffff";}//Hier:TextFarbe ändern
